Title: Requires the inspection of buildings where bicycles with electric assist are repaired, sold, rented, or stored for repair, sale, or rental
Summary: Requires the periodic inspection of commercial buildings where bicycles with electric assist are repaired, sold, rented, or stored for repair, sale, or rental; requires such inspection quarterly; requires the state fire prevention and building code council to establish a fee for such inspection; requires the inspection of such buildings following a fire-related emergency or other fire-related incident.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to requiring the inspection of buildings where bicycles with electric assist are repaired, sold, rented, or stored for repair, sale, or rental
